titlestmt.subtitle: D'Invilliers, Edward, Report Ms1959-002

titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections Ms1959-002
titlepage.publisher: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection consists of a typescript carbon copy of a geological report on the Virginia Anthracite Coal Company property, Price and Brush Mountains in Montgomery County, Virginia by Edward d'Invilliers.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Edward D'Invilliers Report must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Edward D'Invilliers Report, Ms1959-002, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was acquired by Newman Library prior to 1959.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Edward D'Invilliers Report was completed prior to 2010. Additional description was completed in January 2011.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Edward D'Invilliers was a geologist and mining engineer of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a typescript carbon copy of a geological report on the Virginia Anthracite Coal Company property, Price and Brush Mountains in Montgomery County, Virginia.
